inclusion.criterion: early uni- or bilateral defect in the pars interarticularis in the CT-scan
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no signs of bony sclerosis on CT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no signs of spondylolisthesis on standing lumbar radiographs
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bone marrow edema in lumbar spinal MR images
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient is a 14-year-old boy complaining of scoliosis and back pain. He has no other medical condition.
